text: Sulayman al-Alwan is a Saudi scholar who promotes militant jihad to Muslims. He has published works such as a explaination of Kitab at-Tawheed and a explaination of the Three Principles of Islam. He has recieved praise from the former Grand Mufti of Saudi Arabia, Abdulaziz ibn Baz due to his righteousness. He was sent to prison for 15 years due to him being allegedly a "al-Qaeda mufti." == References == Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Muslim scholars Category:Muslims
title: Sulaiman Al-Alwan
